MainSection.title: Your Personal Nutritionist in Your Pocket
MainSection.description: Take a photo of your food, get instant calorie calculation and nutritionist advice
MainSection.subTitle: Join the waiting list

quick-start.title: Quick Start: Data Input
quick-start.description: Enter your information and get a personalized meal plan in 30 seconds. AI will do all the calculations. You just have to follow the recommendations!

statistics.title: Your diary and visual statistics
statistics.description: Track your results: beautiful charts and reports will show how much protein, fat, and carbs you've eaten, how much is left, how your weight is changing, and whether you're following your diet. Get motivated by seeing your progress!

ways.title: Different ways to add food
ways.description: Take a photo of lunch, scan a barcode or say out loud what you ate - the app will calculate calories, proteins, fats and carbohydrates. Save time and forget about manual calculations!

chat.title: Live chat with nutritionist
chat.description: Enter your information and get a personalized meal plan in 30 seconds. AI will do all the calculations. You just have to follow the recommendations!

ai-analysis.title: Powerful AI Nutrition Analysis
ai-analysis.description: Click 'Analysis' and the app will provide a complete report: what percentage of carbs/proteins/fats/calories, your detailed analytics with weight changes and goal achievement chart

EndSection.description: We will respond within a day

WaitingListForm.agreeToUpdates: I want to receive unique materials and project news via email
WaitingListForm.agreement: By filling out the form, you agree to the

errors.nameMinLength: Name must contain at least 2 characters
errors.nameMaxLength: Name must contain at most 20 characters

WaitingListSuccess.title: {name}, you're on the waiting list!
WaitingListSuccess.description: While we're preparing the beta version, try our telegram bot for instant KBJU calculation from photos and descriptions:
WaitingListSuccess.instruction: Join right now to try the basic functionality and keep track of updates!

anna_levina.name: Anna Levina
anna_levina.text: The bot is simply awesome! I took a photo of food and immediately see how many calories and macros are there. Very convenient when there's no time to enter everything manually.

dmitriy_sidorov.name: Dmitry Sidorov
dmitriy_sidorov.text: Really useful thing! Fast, accurate and in Russian. I now count my diet through it every day, it has become a habit.

marina_krivtsova.name: Marina Krivtsova
marina_krivtsova.text: Looks very user-friendly. I liked that the bot itself suggests clarifications if a dish is not recognized. You can feel that it was made with care.

igor_bekbulatov.name: Igor Bekbulatov
igor_bekbulatov.text: I tested it out of curiosity - and stayed! AI integration gives excellent results, and you can also manually add ingredients. Well thought out.

kamila_alaeva.name: Kamila Alaeva
kamila_alaeva.text: For me it was a discovery that you can track nutrition so simply. The bot responds quickly, and the data is quite accurate!

timur_mamaev.name: Timur Mamaev
timur_mamaev.text: Participated in cast devs - cool that the team really listens to feedback. The 'streak' feature is top!

elvira_nasrullaeva.name: Elvira Nasrullaeva
elvira_nasrullaeva.text: When I was first shown the app, I thought - this is going to be a bomb. Convenient diary, detailed analytics, cool visual!

ruslan_ibragimov.name: Ruslan Ibragimov
ruslan_ibragimov.text: It was important for me to be able to adapt to my goals. Here it really worked out - both onboarding and recommendations are great.

zhanna_kerimova.name: Zhanna Kerimova
zhanna_kerimova.text: Thank you for the opportunity to participate in early testing. I noticed that after a week of keeping a diary it became easier to control nutrition.

adam_yunusov.name: Adam Yunusov
adam_yunusov.text: I was among the first to see the MVP. Even then it was clear that the product was strong. I was especially impressed by the part with meal timing recommendations.

HomePage.keywords: business solution, productivity, workflow, automation, smart technology, modern app, business tools, beta test
